definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Myr Welder has all activated abilities of all cards exiled with it.
sentences.chinese: 祕耳焊工具有所有被它放逐之牌的所有起動式異能。

sentences.english: Mt. 13:58 And He did not do many works of power there because of their unbelief.
sentences.chinese: 太十三58因爲他們不信，他就不在那裏多行異能了。

sentences.english: The difference is that psionic powers are spell-like abilities.
sentences.chinese: 區別是心靈異能是類法術能力。

sentences.english: Play this ability as a mana source.
sentences.chinese: 將此異能視爲魔法力源使用。

sentences.english: Connate different can, who and contend for wind.
A psionic power is a one-time psionic effect.
sentences.chinese: 心靈異能是一種一次性的心靈效果。

sentences.english: Strange is, have foreknow prospective different can Marie has been broken recall.
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的是，具有預見未來異能的瑪麗已經失憶。

sentences.english: The weapon telepathically whispers to the wearer the name of the power currently stored within it.
sentences.chinese: 該武器通過心靈感應告知持用者其中所儲異能的名稱。

sentences.english: Psychokinesis powers can deal large amounts of damage.
sentences.chinese: 心靈轉化系異能能造成大量傷害。

sentences.english: You choose the target when the ability triggers .
sentences.chinese: 當此異能觸發時，你便選擇目標。

sentences.english: You are making use of Psionics in the module, can you tell us a little bit more about it?
sentences.chinese: 你在模組中使用了心靈異能，能告訴我更多的信息嗎？

sentences.english: The user must still determine what power is stored in the item before activating it.
sentences.chinese: 使用者仍需在啓動物品前確定何種異能儲於其中。

sentences.english: A pyrokineticist is a psionic prestige class.
sentences.chinese: 操焰者是一種心靈異能進階職業。

sentences.english: If the former owner is dead, the wearer loses the assimilated power.
sentences.chinese: 若先前的擁有者已死，佩戴者仍失去吸收的該異能。

sentences.english: You'll lose the game when the ability resolves.
sentences.chinese: 當此異能結算時，你輸掉這盤遊戲。

sentences.english: Psionic powers have their roots in a living body.
sentences.chinese: 心靈異能要以有生命的活物身體作爲根基。

definition: extermination of an entire family (ancient Chinese punishment)
unique skill/unexpected tricky move (as a last resort)/masterstroke/finishing blow
to die in such a way that sb (or sth) else also perishes/to take sb down with oneself/to end in mutual destruction
to awaken/to come to realize/awakened to the truth/the truth dawns upon one/scales fall from the eyes/to become aware
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
